version_history.change_1: Includes bugfix where Say What would display the incorrect transcription

Audio Files can now be accessed from before June 6th
version_history.change_2: Survey questions now display for all users
version_history.change_3: Resolved an issue where older files could not be played
version_history.change_4: Resolved an issue Guess the Word would not play audio

Added Email "Magic Link" login and Facebook login
Increased buffer size for audio extraction
version_history.change_2: Added ability to discard older audio

version_history.change_3: Restructured audio extraction technique from video files

version_history.change_2: Styled tiles on Scrapbook with recording data
version_history.change_3: Resolved issue with NaN and Infinity during playback
version_history.change_4: Resolved a playback issue in chrome

version_history.change_1: Restructured audio cropper for selecting the start and end of a Recording
version_history.change_2: Guess the Word now uses animations
version_history.change_3: Child age and other information now displayed in Scrapbook
version_history.change_5: Added ability to share recordings with other users
